description: Schema for porch process orchestration framework configuration files

anyOf.description: Executes a list of commands sequentially (one after another)

commands.description: List of commands to execute sequentially

env.description: Environment variables to set for the command

runs_on_condition.description: Condition that determines when this command runs: 'success', 'error', 'always', or 'exit-codes'

runs_on_exit_codes.description: Specific exit codes that trigger execution (used with runs_on_condition: exit-codes)

working_directory.description: Directory in which the command should be executed

anyOf.description: Executes a list of commands in parallel (simultaneously)

commands.description: List of commands to execute in parallel

env.description: Environment variables to set for the command

runs_on_condition.description: Condition that determines when this command runs: 'success', 'error', 'always', or 'exit-codes'

runs_on_exit_codes.description: Specific exit codes that trigger execution (used with runs_on_condition: exit-codes)

working_directory.description: Directory in which the command should be executed

anyOf.description: Executes commands in each directory found by traversing the filesystem.

commands.description: List of commands to execute in each directory

env.description: Environment variables to set for the command

include_hidden.description: Whether to include hidden directories in traversal

runs_on_condition.description: Condition that determines when this command runs: 'success', 'error', 'always', or 'exit-codes'

runs_on_exit_codes.description: Specific exit codes that trigger execution (used with runs_on_condition: exit-codes)

working_directory.description: Directory in which the command should be executed

working_directory_strategy.description: Strategy for setting working directory: 'none', 'item_relative', or 'item_absolute'

anyOf.description: Copies the current working directory to a temporary directory. Future working directories will be set to the temporary directory.

env.description: Environment variables to set for the command

runs_on_condition.description: Condition that determines when this command runs: 'success', 'error', 'always', or 'exit-codes'

runs_on_exit_codes.description: Specific exit codes that trigger execution (used with runs_on_condition: exit-codes)

working_directory.description: Directory in which the command should be executed

anyOf.description: Executes a shell command with configurable success and skip exit codes

command_line.description: The command to execute, can be a path or a command name

env.description: Environment variables to set for the command

runs_on_condition.description: Condition that determines when this command runs: 'success', 'error', 'always', or 'exit-codes'

runs_on_exit_codes.description: Specific exit codes that trigger execution (used with runs_on_condition: exit-codes)

skip_exit_codes.description: Exit codes that indicate skip remaining tasks, defaults to empty

success_exit_codes.description: Exit codes that indicate success, defaults to 0

working_directory.description: Directory in which the command should be executed

description.description: Description of what this configuration does
